title: Persona
description: This schema defines the Persona entity. A `Persona` is a job function associated with a user. An Example, Data Engineer or Data Consumer is a Persona of a user in Metadata world.

name.description: A unique name of Persona. Example 'data engineer'

displayName.description: Name used for display purposes. Example 'Data Steward'.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

uiCustomization.description: Reference to the UI customization configuration.

users.description: Users that are assigned a persona.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

domain.description: Domain the asset belongs to. When not set, the asset inherits the domain from the parent it belongs to.

default.description: When true, this persona is the system-wide default persona that will be applied to users who don't have any persona assigned or no default persona set.
